5001.name: A Long Tunnel
5001.description:
You encounter some rapids as you enter this tunnel cut out of the
mountains by the river. Waves crash and foam relentlessly. The depths
are dark and unknowable.

west.description: There appear to be some bars here, making passage to the west difficult.

5002.name: A Long Tunnel
5002.description:
The tunnel stretches endlessly through solid rock, carved by ancient
hands or perhaps erosion from underground rivers. Limestone walls
glisten with moisture, and your footsteps echo into the darkness ahead.
The depths are dark and unknowable. Waves crash and foam relentlessly.

5003.name: A Long Tunnel
5003.description:
Rough-hewn stone walls press in from both sides as the tunnel continues
its descent. The air grows cooler here, and you can hear the distant
drip of water echoing through unseen chambers. The roar of water fills
your ears. The water churns with dangerous currents.

5004.name: A Tunnel Intersection
5004.description:
Multiple tunnels converge at this intersection, each passage
disappearing into darkness. Strange symbols are carved into the
junction's walls, possibly markers left by whoever built these passages.
Spray mists the air around. The depths are dark and unknowable.

5005.name: An Underground Lake
5005.description:
The void stretches on a jet-black underground lake fed by dripping water
and lime from above. The tunnel continues to the east and the river
leads back west. Leading upwards to the northwest is a roughly hewn
hallway. Spray mists the air around. Waves crash and foam relentlessly.

5006.name: A Long Narrow Tunnel
5006.description:
The tunnel rises sharply to the east. Another narrow tunnel leads away
to the north. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The wind howls around
exposed peaks.

5007.name: A Wide Tunnel
5007.description:
The tunnel continues east and west. To the east the tunnel dives down
into a bright light. A small passage way opens to the north. The path is
steep and treacherous. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

5008.name: The Cave-In
5008.description:
The area opens at the edge of a large pile of rubble created from the
last rockslide. Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The air is thin and
cold at this altitude.

down.description: You can easily slide down the rocks without getting hurt.

5009.name: At The Foot Of The Rubble
5009.description:
This is the bottom of a large pile of rubble. A tunnel branches off to
the north and east. The path is steep and treacherous. The air is thin
and cold at this altitude.

5010.name: A Cave Entrance
5010.description:
The area opens in the middle of a large and beautiful cave. A path leads
deeper into the darkness. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The path is
steep and treacherous.

down.description: You look down into the cave.  Bones are strewn about everywhere.

5011.name: A Giant Cave
5011.description:
This cavern overwhelms you. The walls and ceiling seem miles away. Bones
of previous adventurers lie strewn on the cavern floor. There is a
passage that spirals downwards in the northeast corner of the cavern.
Bare rock dominates the landscape. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

down.description: The passageway spirals down into the gloom.

5012.name: A Narrow Bend
5012.description:
The tunnel bends sharply here, forcing you to navigate carefully around
jagged outcroppings. Water trickles down the curved wall, leaving
mineral deposits that sparkle in any available light. Bare rock
dominates the landscape. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

5013.name: A Large Cave
5013.description:
This is a large cave. Many furs are spread out on the floor. The path is
steep and treacherous. Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The rocky
terrain is steep and unforgiving. Thin air makes breathing difficult.

5014.name: A Damp Hallway
5014.description:
The walls here are extremely damp, as well as the floor. The path is
steep and treacherous. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The rocky
terrain is steep and unforgiving. Thin air makes breathing difficult.

east.description: You hear drops of water.

5015.name: An Underground Pool
5015.description:
A natural underground pool fills this chamber, its surface perfectly
still and dark as obsidian. The water looks deep and ancient, fed by
underground springs that predate the desert above. The current tugs
gently at your limbs. Fish dart beneath the waves.

5016.name: A Damp Hallway
5016.description:
The walls of the tunnel are extremely damp here. The tunnel leads
sharply upwards to the south as it starts to get narrow. Snow clings to
shadowed crevices. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

west.description: You hear drops of water.

5017.name: A Narrow Crawlway
5017.description:
This crawlway is just big enough for a human to crawl through or a
halfling to walk through. The path is steep and treacherous. Bare rock
dominates the landscape.

south.description: You smell the fragrant odor of fungus.

5018.name: A Large Cavern
5018.description:
The entrance opens to a very large cavern. The rock formations would
amaze almost any dwarf. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The path is
steep and treacherous.

5019.name: A Fungus Patch
5019.description:
As you walk through the fungus patch, you are shot at by many millions
of spores. You can hardly breathe. Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The
wind howls around exposed peaks.

east.description: The fragrant smell of fungus spores continues to the east.

5020.name: The Fungus Path
5020.description:
As you walk along the path, millions of spores are shot at you. It is
difficult to breathe. A section of the path feels hollow underfoot. The
path is steep and treacherous. The air is thin and cold at this
altitude.

south.description: A giant mushroom temple stands to the south.

west.description: The fragrant smell of spores continues to the west.

down.description: Loose stones conceal a sink into darkness.
down.reveal_message: The stones give way, revealing a hidden descent.

5021.name: The Fungus Temple
5021.description:
The passage opens standing inside of a giant mushroom. The inside is
decorated in the fashion of a temple. Bare rock dominates the landscape.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

5022.name: A Sloping Passage
5022.description:
You follow a path sloping down from the fungus temple. Snow clings to
shadowed crevices. The wind howls around exposed peaks. The rocky
terrain is steep and unforgiving. Thin air makes breathing difficult.

5023.name: A Sloping Passage
5023.description:
The area is a path that gently slopes up from the underground pool. Snow
clings to shadowed crevices. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.
The rocky terrain is steep and unforgiving. Thin air makes breathing
difficult.

north.description: You hear sounds of trickling water.

5024.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5024.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the
west. The open sky stretches overhead. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5025.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5025.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the
west. The air is fresh and clean. The open sky stretches overhead.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5026.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5026.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the
west. The hole which you tumbled out of is too high for you to reach.
Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5027.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5027.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the
west. The ground is soft underfoot. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5028.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5028.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north-east and a snow-capped mountain range
to the west. You spy a narrow dirt trail leading away to the west into
the foothills. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The air is fresh and
clean.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: A small dirt trail leads off to the west where it joins a large clay road some distance away.

5029.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5029.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north-east and a snow-capped mountain range
to the west. Wildflowers dot the landscape. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5030.name: A Small Oasis
5030.description:
The area opens beside a small pool of crystal-blue water bathed in the
shade of a few scarce palm trees. To the north you see a small
encampment stopped for the day. The oasis pool burbles with a hollow
echo. Wildflowers dot the landscape. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze.

north.description: You see three tents and some camels hitched to a stake.  Shadows moving  across the tents suggest activity.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

down.description: A stone hatch beneath the waterline.
down.reveal_message: You find a hatch hidden beneath the oasis water.

5031.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5031.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the east. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.
Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5032.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5032.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the east. The air is fresh and clean. The ground
is soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5033.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5033.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north-east. The air is fresh and clean. The
open sky stretches overhead.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5034.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5034.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the south-east. The air is fresh and clean. The
ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5035.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5035.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the east, it looks enormous, even from this
distance. The open sky stretches overhead. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Even from here, you can sense a great evil residing within the pyramid protruding from the sand to the east.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5036.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5036.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north-east. The air is fresh and clean. Tall
grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5037.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5037.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north-east. Wildflowers dot the landscape.
The open sky stretches overhead.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5038.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5038.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the south. The open sky stretches overhead. Tall
grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5039.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5039.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the south. The gates of a city lie a short
distance off to the north. Wildflowers dot the landscape. The open sky
stretches overhead.

north.description: Some city gates stand off to the north.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5040.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5040.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. The area is near a gigantic pyramid located a couple hundred meters
to the west. From here you can sense the great evil which resides within
the massive structure. A patch of sand nearby feels colder than the
rest. The air is fresh and clean. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: The pyramid can be seen across the sands to the west.

down.description: A sinkhole hidden beneath loose sand.
down.reveal_message: The sand collapses, revealing a buried reliquary below.

5041.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5041.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north. The ground is soft underfoot.
Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: Even from here, you can sense a great evil residing within the pyramid protruding from the sand to the north.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5042.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5042.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north. The open sky stretches overhead. The
ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5043.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5043.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.
The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5044.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5044.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north and a ruined city to the west. The air
is fresh and clean. The open sky stretches overhead.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5045.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5045.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the south. The ground is soft underfoot. Tall
grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5046.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5046.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the south-west. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5047.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5047.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the west. The open sky stretches overhead.
Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Even from here, you can sense a great evil residing within the pyramid protruding from the sand to the west.

5048.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5048.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the west. Wildflowers dot the landscape. The open
sky stretches overhead.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5049.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5049.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north-west. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5050.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5050.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north. A wind-carved crevice to the west is
almost invisible in the glare. The air is fresh and clean. The ground is
soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see... and a pyramid in the distance.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: A narrow crevice in the dune wall.
west.reveal_message: You spot a slit in the dune wall leading west.

5051.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5051.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the south-west and a deep canyon to the east. The
air is fresh and clean. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5052.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5052.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the south-west and a deep canyon to the east.
Just below can make out a tiny ledge. The ground is soft underfoot.
Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5053.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5053.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the west and a deep canyon to the east. Tall
grass sways in a gentle breeze. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: A rickety rope bridge stretches across the canyon... it doesn't look too safe.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5054.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5054.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the west and a deep canyon to the east. The air
is fresh and clean. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5055.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5055.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you. A pyramid lies to the north-west and a deep canyon to the east.
Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5056.name: A Nomad Camp
5056.description:
This small group of desert nomads has stopped for the day to rest and
refresh themselves beside this beautiful oasis. Three tents and some
camels make up the party. From within two of the tents you hear muffled
voices, obviously surprised at your visit. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze. The open sky stretches overhead.

north.description: Some camels are tied up to a mass of stakes plugged into the ground.

east.description: You see inside one of the tents a huddled mass of people, probably slaves.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5057.name: Inside A Small Tent
5057.description:
This is a small and simple tent with few possessions in sight. Lying
here and there are young-looking men and women, possibly slaves to the
leader of this band. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The ground is
soft underfoot.

west.description: You see the center of the nomad camp.

5058.name: Beside The Camels
5058.description:
Here stand about ten camels, all hitched to some stakes plugged into the
ground. To the east you see a small tent while to the north you see a
larger, fancier tent. The air is fresh and clean. Tall grass sways in a
gentle breeze.

north.description: This tent seems to be the temporary abode of the nomad leader.  You make a mental note to visit it before you leave.

east.description: In this tent there are very large men, all carrying weapons.

south.description: You see the center of the nomad camp.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5059.name: The Warriors' Tent
5059.description:
This tent has a few furnishings, but mainly it holds the band's
protectors. They all stare at you coldly as you enter. Wildflowers dot
the landscape. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.

west.description: Outside you see some peaceful camels.

5060.name: The Main Tent
5060.description:
This tent is as lavishly decorated on the inside as it is on the
outside. A fancy carpet lies on the sand and numerous baskets line the
walls. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The ground is soft
underfoot.

south.description: You see some peaceful camels.

5061.name: The Main Tent
5061.description:
This is where the leader of this band of nomads resides. He is
definitely rich as you inspect the tapestries, baskets, and a few
paintings as well. The air is fresh and clean. Wildflowers dot the
landscape.

west.description: You see the entrance to this tent.

5062.name: The Rickety Rope Bridge
5062.description:
You carefully begin to walk across the bridge, but suddenly the rope
breaks and you fall... ... and fall and fall and fall ... to your death
on the rocks below. The path is steep and treacherous. Bare rock
dominates the landscape.

5063.name: The Wind-Swept Ledge
5063.description:
Being very careful not to lose your balance, you look around and find
that this canyon is about a half a kilometer deep. To the west is a dark
cave leading under the desert sands and above a rope bridge spans
the gap. The path is steep and treacherous. The air is thin and cold at
this altitude.

up.description: The desert sands blow down in your face.

5064.name: The Cave Mouth
5064.description:
The air in here is MUCH cooler than outside. From the west you hear
strange sounds, but can see nothing. The cave slopes down into the
darkness. The air is thin and cold at this altitude. Snow clings to
shadowed crevices.

east.description: Outside is lighter and very windy.

5065.name: The Mysterious Lair
5065.description:
You have stumbled upon the home of something. From the treasure
haphazardly strewn about and the rotting carcasses, you would guess that
this is a dragon's lair. As to what type, you can't really say. The cave
narrows out into a tunnel to the west. To the north, a treacherous
mountain path climbs toward distant peaks wreathed in smoke. The path is
steep and treacherous. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: A dangerous mountain path leads upward toward smoke-wreathed peaks - the Dragon's Domain.

5066.name: A Wide Tunnel
5066.description:
This tunnel seems to go on forever into the darkness. You carefully feel
your way along the walls. The wind howls around exposed peaks. The path
is steep and treacherous.

5067.name: A Narrower Tunnel
5067.description:
The tunnel becomes very narrow and you fight to squeeze your way
through. The floor seems to level off a little. The path is steep and
treacherous. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

5068.name: A Narrow Crack
5068.description:
This part of the tunnel is the hardest to move through as the walls move
in to meet you. The wind howls around exposed peaks. The air is thin and
cold at this altitude.

5069.name: A Small Cavern
5069.description:
It is dark and damp and bats hang from the ceiling. A narrow crack is in
the east wall. The floor now slopes upwards. The path is steep and
treacherous. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

5070.name: A Small Shaft
5070.description:
From within this shaft Visible is a narrow hole in the roof just large
enough for one person. Back east is the cavern. The air is thin and cold
at this altitude. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

5071.name: A Buried Reliquary
5071.description:
An ancient chamber sealed under the dunes. Carved reliefs depict a sun
cult and a lost caravan. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

5072.name: A Wind-Carved Grotto
5072.description:
This tiny grotto is cool and still. Wind-scoured stones form natural
shelves. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

east.description: The crevice returns to the desert.

5073.name: The Oasis Cellar
5073.description:
Beneath the oasis, a stone cellar keeps the air cool. A bundle of
letters is tucked into a niche. The air is still and musty. Shadows
gather in the corners.

up.description: The hatch leads back to the oasis.

5074.name: A Shifting Dune Sink
5074.description:
A narrow sink drops to a sandy hollow. The walls whisper as the dunes
shift above. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

up.description: The loose stones lead back up.

5000.name: dervish
5000.long_desc: A raggity dervish walks on aimlessly.
5000.description: Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use some rest.

5001.name: dervish
5001.long_desc: A large dervish watches for signs of trouble.
5001.description:
Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use LOTS of
rest.

5002.name: snake
5002.long_desc: A brightly colored snake slithers along the sands.
5002.description:
This relatively harmless snake has bright alternating bands of red, yellow
and black.

5003.name: scorpion
5003.long_desc: A small, red scorpion scuttles away at your approach.
5003.description: The little tail is mighty dangerous for such a small creature.

5004.name: worm
5004.long_desc: A giant, purple sand worm thrusts up out of the sand and attacks!
5004.description: He's big, mean, and purple.  Watch out!

5005.name: dragon
5005.long_desc: A very large brass dragon steps out of the darkness and says 'Hello.'
5005.description: Then adds to it, 'Prepare to die, have a nice day!'

5006.name: nomad
5006.long_desc: The nomad leader sits silently in prayer.
5006.description:
He is clad in silk robes lined with gold thread. At his side is a large,
engraved cutlass.  He has an especially haughty air about him.

5007.name: nomad
5007.long_desc: The nomad commander stands here staring at you suspiciously.
5007.description:
This is the nomad leader's second in command.  His clothes are richly woven
of silk and gold thread.  A nasty cutlass hangs at his side.

5008.name: nomad
5008.long_desc: A proud nomad warrior stands here.
5008.description: This warrior is dressed in typical nomad clothing and looks quite mean.

5009.name: slave
5009.long_desc: A young slave sits here staring at you with pleading eyes.
5009.description: She looks quite thin and weak.

5010.name: dracolich
5010.long_desc: A pile of bones rises up to form a skeletal dracolich.
5010.description:
The dracolich is now only bone with pieces of flesh hanging from it.
Obviously it no longer fears death.

5011.name: drider
5011.long_desc: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
5011.description: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

5012.name: duergar
5012.long_desc: A duergar is here mining precious stones with his pick.
5012.description:
The duergar could probably crush your head as easily as he does those
rocks.

5013.name: myconoid
5013.description:
The myconoid looks something like a giant mushroom (and probably has the
same effect).

5014.name: myconoid
5014.long_desc: A rather large myconoid stands here chanting in a strange tongue.
5014.description: The shaman shoots spores into the air.

5015.name: dustdigger
5015.long_desc: A small oasis invites you to dive in.
5015.description:
Looking a little closer at this oasis, you begin to wonder why
it seems to be moving about...

5017.name: camel
5017.long_desc: A very dangerous creature, a camel, snorts at you.
5017.description:
It is advisable not to mess with this creature.  After all, you
have heard many a horror story about experiences with camels.
Bad experiences.

5000.name: pick
5000.room_desc: A small mining pick made of what appears to be silver lies on the ground.

5002.name: halberd
5002.room_desc: A mighty halberd lies against the wall.

5003.name: amulet
5003.room_desc: A mushroom-shaped amulet lies on the ground.

5005.name: bone
5005.room_desc: A large leg bone rests on the ground.

5006.name: cactus
5006.room_desc: A small cactus cup lies on the ground.

5007.name: basket
5007.room_desc: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

5009.name: basket
5009.room_desc: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

5010.name: basket
5010.room_desc: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

5011.name: rope
5011.room_desc: A long coil of rope lies on the ground.

5012.name: stakes
5012.room_desc: A small bundle of stakes lies here.

5013.name: map
5013.room_desc: An old, tattered, and much faded map lies here.

5014.name: turban
5014.room_desc: A thick padded turban lies here.

5015.name: coins
5015.room_desc: A great, gleaming pile of treasure lies at your feet.

5016.name: sabre
5016.room_desc: A long, curved sabre stands upright in the ground.

5017.name: scimitar
5017.room_desc: A curved scimitar lies at your feet.

5018.name: cutlass
5018.room_desc: A long, pointed cutlass lies here.

5021.name: bow
5021.room_desc: A powerful golden bow lies here.

5022.name: scroll
5022.room_desc: An encrypted scroll lies at your feet.

5023.name: chest
5023.room_desc: An iron bound chest with a shiny lock sits here.

5024.name: key
5024.room_desc: A shiny golden key lies here.

5025.name: bracelet
5025.room_desc: A tarnished copper bracelet lies at your feet.

5026.name: ruby
5026.room_desc: A large ruby lies on the ground, collecting dust.

5027.name: diamond
5027.room_desc: A glittering diamond lies at your feet.

5028.name: sapphire
5028.room_desc: A brilliant sapphire lies here, twinkling happily.

5029.name: lapis
5029.room_desc: A deep blue lapis lazuli gem lies here.

5030.name: jewel
5030.room_desc: The Tiger Jewel lies here blazing.

5031.name: jewel
5031.room_desc: The red-eyed jewel glares at you greedily.

5032.name: emerald
5032.room_desc: A fiery green emerald sits here.

5050.name: a sand-worn tablet
5050.room_desc: A sand-worn tablet rests against the wall.
5050.description: Faded carvings depict a sun disk and a winding road.
5050.lore_text: "We followed the star that burned at noon and found the well that never dried."

5051.name: a nomad's letter
5051.room_desc: A bundle of letters lies here.
5051.description: The paper is brittle but still legible.
5051.lore_text: "The dunes shift each night. Trust the rocks, not the stars."

5052.name: a sun-baked reliquary chest
5052.room_desc: A sun-baked chest is half-buried here.
5052.description: The lid is etched with a blazing sun.

5053.name: an oasis copper key
5053.room_desc: A copper key glints at the edge of the pool.
5053.description: The key smells faintly of fresh water.

5054.name: a scorpionglass amulet
5054.room_desc: A dark amulet glints in the shade.
5054.description: A piece of black glass carved into a scorpion.

5063.name: scarf of the wastes
5063.room_desc: A scarf of the wastes lies here.
